company_name: Weifang Risen Industrial Technology Co., Ltd.
tagline: One-stop consumables solution makes procurement more efficient.
about_text: Weifang Risen Industrial Technology Co., Ltd. is located in the foundry industry belt of Weifang, Shandong Province. We specialize in surface treatment equipment and consumables. Our product line includes shot blasting machines, spare parts, magnetic separation equipment, crushers, drum screens, dust collectors, filter bags, metal abrasives and related supporting products, providing customers with one-stop, comprehensive solutions.
